item.title: CodeForces 697D 树+概率
item.description: 原题链接 D. Puzzles time limit per test 1 second memory limit per test 256 megabytes input standard input output standard output Barney lives in country USC (United States of Charzeh). USC has n cities numbered from 1 through n and n - 1 roads between them. Cities and roads of USC form a rooted tree (Barney's not sure why it is rooted). Root of the tree is
